relatedTransactions.description: Identifiers of any transactions detailed in the `Transactions` section related to this item detailed.

relatedTransactions.title: Related transactions

relatedTransactions.title: Related Transactions
relatedTransactions.description: Identifiers of any transactions detailed in the `Transactions` section relating to this award.

relatedTransactions.title: Related Transactions
relatedTransactions.description: Identifiers of any transactions detailed in the `Transactions` section relating to this contract.

relatedTransaction.title: Related transaction
relatedTransaction.description: Identifiers of any transactions detailed in the `Transactions` section relating to fees exchanged for this bid.

ValueBreakdown.title: Value Breakdown
ValueBreakdown.description: Information on a single value of importance, including net, gross, taxes or discounts applied.

id.title: Value Identifier
id.description: A locally unique identifier for this Value Breakdown. Used to track changes to this value breakdown and to [merge](https://standard.open-contracting.org/latest/en/schema/merging/#merging) multiple releases to create a record.

description.title: Value Breakdown Description
description.description: A short description of the amount, including any reasoning where necessary.

rate.title: Rate Applied
rate.description: In the case of a proportional tax or discount, this displays the rate given as a decimal.

value.title: Value Breakdown Amount
value.description: The amount covered in this value breakdown.

PaymentAuthorizer.title: Payment Authorizer
PaymentAuthorizer.description: The name and identifiers of a person who authorised the payment covered in this transaction.

id.title: Authorizer Identifier
id.description: An local identifier for this authorizer array item

name.title: Authorizer Name
name.description: The name of the person who authorized this transaction

LineItem.title: Line Item
LineItem.description: The details of an individual item if there is a breakdown of multiple items covered in this transaction.

id.title: Line Item ID
id.description: A locally unique identifier for this Line Item. Used to track changes to this line item and to [merge](https://standard.open-contracting.org/latest/en/schema/merging/#merging) multiple releases to create a record.

description.title: Line Item Description
description.description: A description detailing the contents covered in this line item.

unit.title: Line Item Unit
unit.description: A description of the unit in which the supplies, services or works are provided (e.g. hours, kilograms) and the unit-price.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The number of units to be provided.

value.title: Total Line Item Value
value.description: The total value of this line item.

valueBreakdown.title: Line Item Value Breakdown
valueBreakdown.description: The breakdown of the value for this line item, including any taxes or discounts applied.

TransactionDetail.title: Transaction
TransactionDetail.description: A record of monetary exchange including who was involved, and the option of unit measures, tax and item volumes.

id.title: Transaction ID
id.description: A unique identifier for this transaction, SHOULD be compiled id including date, PO number and buyer.

sourceUrl.title: Transaction Source URL
sourceUrl.description: A URI pointing to the source data or payments procedures of this transaction.

paymentMethod.title: Payment Method
paymentMethod.description: Mechanism for completing payment, for example BACS or Purchase card.

description.title: Transaction description
description.description: An string covering details for this transaction.

invoiceReceiptDate.title: Invoice Receipt Date
invoiceReceiptDate.description: The date on which the invoice is received

paymentDueDate.title: Payment Due Date
paymentDueDate.description: The date on which this payment is due.

paymentApprovalDate.title: Payment Approval Date
paymentApprovalDate.description: The date on which this payment is approved.

paymentExecutedDate.title: Payment Execution Date
paymentExecutedDate.description: The date on which this payment is executed.

value.title: Transaction value
value.description: The total value covered in this transaction.

valueBreakdown.title: Value Breakdown
valueBreakdown.description: A breakdown of the net and gross value, including details of any tax or discount applied. A discount is indicated by a negative amount.

payer.title: Payer
payer.description: A reference for the organization from which the funds in this transaction originate.

paymentExecutor.title: Payment executor
paymentExecutor.description: The name of the person who executed the payment of this transaction

paymentAuthorizers.title: Payment Authorizers
paymentAuthorizers.description: An array of details of people involved in the authorization of this payment.

payee.title: Payee
payee.description: An organization reference for the organization which receives the funds in this transaction.

budgetCode.title: Budget Code
budgetCode.description: Reference code for the budget of this transaction.

accountCode.title: Account Code
accountCode.description: Code linking the payment to the Accounts Payable code.

classification.title: Transaction Classification
classification.description: A classification of category associated with items covered in this transaction, such as CPV codes..

lineItems.title: Line Items
lineItems.description: Array of the breakdown of individual items covered in this transaction.

TransactionsDetails.title: Transactions
TransactionsDetails.description: An array of transactions with a detailed breakdown of costs, taxes and persons involved
